role.argrole: place arg0 moves arg1 to be planted

example.parse: (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *pro*)) (VP (PP-LOC (P 在) (LCP (NP (DNP (NP-PN (NR 甘比亚)) (DEG 的)) (NP (NN 土地))) (LC 上))) (PU ，) (ADVP (AD 也)) (DVP (VP (VA 成功)) (DEV 地)) (VP (VRD (VV 栽培) (VV 出)) (NP-OBJ (CP (WHNP-1 (-NONE- *OP*)) (CP (IP (NP-SBJ (-NONE- *T*-1)) (VP (NP-PN-DIR (NR 台湾)) (VP (VV 移种)))) (DEC 的))) (NP-APP (NN 蕃茄) (PU 、) (NN 四季豆) (PU 、) (NN 黄秋葵) (PU 、) (NN 叶菜类) (ETC 等)) (NP (NN 作物))))))
